scripts.django: docker compose exec backend python manage.py
scripts.makemigrations: docker compose exec backend python manage.py makemigrations
scripts.migrate: docker compose exec backend python manage.py migrate
scripts.createsuperuser: docker compose exec backend python manage.py createsuperuser
scripts.populate_langs: docker compose exec backend python manage.py populate_languages
scripts.populate_osm: docker compose exec backend python manage.py populate_products && docker compose exec backend python manage.py populate_orders
